At present, there is no evidence to support the effectiveness of antiviral drugs for COVID-19, although these are commonly used in the treatment of COVID-19 in China. The guidelines of the NHC recommend interferon-α2b inhalation, lopinavir/ritonavir, ribavirin, chloroquine, and arbidol as antiviral therapy and does not recommend using more than 2 antiviral drugs at the same time ( Table 3 ).
